net.davidtanzer.jobjectformatter.typeinfo

Class TypeInfoCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.davidtanzer.jobjectformatter.typeinfo.TypeInfoCache

  • public class TypeInfoCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates and caches information about types (classes) so that the later stages of processing can use this information. The TypeInfoCache compiles and caches information about classes that will be needed by the ObjectValuesCompiler. It creates a TypeInfo object for every class it processes. TypeInfoCache functionality (extracted from the tests by agiledox):
    • Creates type info object for class.
    • Uses type info from cache if available.
    • Type info has information from the formatted annotation on class.
    • Type info contains a class info for every class in the hierarchy.
    • Class infos of type info are ordered from type itself to classes up the call hierarchy.
    • Every class info contains fields from the class.
    • Class info does not contain fields from other classes.
    • Uses fields filter to actually get the relevant fields for a class info.
    • Transitive include for unannotated class is disallowed.
    • Transitive include for annotated class is determined by annotation value.
    • Transitive include for annotated to string is determined by annotation value.
    • Transitive include for annotated class is more important than annotation on class.
    TypeInfoTransitivity functionality (extracted from the tests by agiledox):
    • All type infos from java packages are transitive.
    • Type infos for other dependencies are not transitive by default.
    • Type infos from java packages can be set to non transitive by annotation.
    • Type infos from other packages can be set to transitive by annotation.
    See Also:
    TypeInfo, ObjectValuesCompiler

        public TypeInfo typeInfoFor(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Get the type info for a certain type (from the cache if available).
        Parameters:
        type - The java class for which you need a type info.

      • typeInfoFor

        public TypeInfo typeInfoFor(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                            TransitiveInclude transitiveInclude)
        Get the type info for a certain type with a different include configuration(from the cache if available).
        Parameters:
        type - The java class for which you need a type info.
        transitiveInclude - The transitive include configuration for the type info.

      • configurationFor

        public <T> T configurationFor(java.lang.Class<?> type,
                              java.util.function.Function<Formatted,T> mappingFunction,
                              T defaultValue)
        Get a certain configuration for a type, based on it's Formatted annotation value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The configuration type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type for which you need the configuration.
        mappingFunction - A function that extracts the configuration from a Formatted annotation.
        defaultValue - The default value you'll use when no annotation is present.
        Returns:
        The extracted configuration (either computed by calling the provided mapping function, or the defaultValue).
        See Also:
        Formatted
